import React, { PureComponent } from 'react' import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import Grid from '@material-ui/core/Grid' export default class SignupForm extends PureComponent { state = {} handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault() this.props.onSubmit(this.state) } handleChange = (event) => { const { name, value } = event.target this.setState({ [name]: value }) } render() { return (
USERNAME PASSWORD
) } }
